Name: Acrobatic Performer
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Use Acrobatics to Perform.

Name: Additional Lore
Benefits: Become trained in another Lore subcategory.

Name: Alchemical Crafting
Benefits: Craft alchemical items.

Name: All of the Animal
Benefits: You know how to make the best and most efficient use of a hunted animal's carcass.

Name: Arcane Sense
Benefits: Cast detect magic at will as an arcane innate spell.

Name: Armor Assist
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: trained in Athletics or Warfare Lore
Benefits: Don armor more quickly.

Name: Assurance
Prerequisites: trained in at least one skill
Benefits: Receive a fixed result on a skill check.

Name: Bargain Hunter
Benefits: Earn Income by searching for deals.

Name: Battle Medicine
Benefits: Heal yourself or an ally in battle.

Name: Bon Mot
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Distract a foe with a witty quip.

Name: Cat Fall
Benefits: Treat falls as shorter than they are.

Name: Charlatan
Benefits: You’ve learned to mimic the abilities of spellcasters by studying their flourishes and words

Name: Charming Liar
Benefits: Improve a target's attitude with your lies.

Name: Combat Climber
Benefits: Fight more effectively as you Climb.

Name: Concealing Legerdemain
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Conceal an Object using Thievery instead of Stealth.

Name: Courtly Graces
Benefits: Use Society to get along in noble society.

Name: Crafter's Appraisal
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Use Crafting to identify magic items.

Name: Crystal Healing
Benefits: You know how to stimulate a body's natural healing abilities through the application of resonant crystals.

Name: Deceptive Worship
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Pass yourself off as a member of a religion.

Name: Dubious Knowledge
Prerequisites: trained in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action
Benefits: Learn true and erroneous knowledge on failed check.

Name: Experienced Professional
Benefits: Prevent critical failures when Earning Income.

Name: Experienced Smuggler
Benefits: Conceal items from observers more effectively.

Name: Experienced Tracker
Benefits: Track at your full Speed at a –5 penalty.

Name: Express Rider
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Increase your mount’s travel speed.

Name: Eye for Numbers
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: +2 to Decipher Writing about math and count items quickly.

Name: Fascinating Performance
Benefits: Perform to fascinate observers.

Name: Forager
Benefits: Forage for supplies to provide for multiple creatures.

Name: Forensic Acumen
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Rapidly examine a body and Recall Knowledge about it.

Name: Glean Contents
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Decipher Writing even when you can’t see the document well.

Name: Group Coercion
Benefits: Coerce multiple targets simultaneously.

Name: Group Impression
Benefits: Make an Impression on multiple targets at once.

Name: Hefty Hauler
Benefits: Increase your Bulk limits by 2.

Name: Hobnobber
Benefits: Gather Information rapidly.

Name: Impressive Performance
Benefits: Make an Impression with Performance.

Name: Improvise Tool
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Craft basic tools without a basic crafter’s book.

Name: Inoculation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Grant patients +2 to saves against getting a disease again.

Name: Intimidating Glare
Benefits: Demoralize a creature without speaking.

Name: Lengthy Diversion
Benefits: Remain hidden after you Create a Diversion.

Name: Lie to Me
Benefits: Use Deception to detect lies.

Name: Medical Researcher
Benefits: Kassi has taught you not only how to apply medicines with your medical skills but how to craft them as well.

Name: Multilingual
Benefits: Learn two new languages.

Name: Natural Medicine
Benefits: Use Nature to Treat Wounds.

Name: No Cause for Alarm
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Reduce creatures’ frightened condition values.

Name: Oddity Identification
Benefits: +2 to Occultism checks to Identify Magic with certain traits.

Name: Pickpocket
Benefits: Steal or Palm an Object more effectively.

Name: Pilgrim's Token
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: A religious token lets you act ﬁrst on a tie for initiative.

Name: Quick Coercion
Benefits: Coerce a creature quickly.

Name: Quick Identification
Prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
Benefits: Identify Magic in 1 minute or less.

Name: Quick Jump
Benefits: High Jump or Long Jump as a single action.

Name: Quick Repair
Benefits: Repair items quickly.

Name: Quick Squeeze
Benefits: Move swiftly as you Squeeze.

Name: Ravening's Desperation
Benefits: Your study of the Beast of Gluttondark has taught you how to make do in the most trying of circumstances rather than succumb to weakness.

Name: Read Lips
Benefits: Read the lips of people you can see.

Name: Read Psychometric Resonance
Benefits: With a touch, you can read the psychic impressions left on objects by their previous owners.

Name: Recognize Spell
Prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
Benefits: Identify a spell as a reaction as it's being cast.

Name: Reveal True Name
Source: Secrets of Magic
Traits: Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, General, Mental, Skill, True Name
Prerequisites: trained in Intimidation and at least one of Arcana, Nature, Occult, and Religion
Benefits: You attempt to get a creature to do as you wish by threatening them with your knowledge of their true name.

Name: Risky Surgery
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Deal damage to a patient to gain +2 to Treat Wounds.

Name: Root Magic
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Create a token that grants a bonus against a spell or haunt.

Name: Schooled in Secrets
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Gather Information about secret societies and mystery cults.

Name: Seasoned
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: trained in Crafting, Cooking Lore, or Alcohol Lore
Benefits: +1 to Craft food and drink, including potions.

Name: Secret Speech
Benefits: Learn the secret language of a society.

Name: Sign Language
Benefits: Learn sign languages.

Name: Skill Training
Benefits: Become trained in a skill.

Name: Snare Crafting
Benefits: Craft snares.

Name: Specialty Crafting
Benefits: Gain bonuses to Craft certain items.

Name: Steady Balance
Benefits: Maintain your balance in adverse conditions.

Name: Stitch Flesh
Source: Book of the Dead
Benefits: You can use Treat Wounds to restore Hit Points to undead creatures, not just living ones.

Name: Streetwise
Benefits: Use Society to Gather Information and Recall Knowledge.

Name: Student of the Canon
Benefits: More accurately recognize the tenets of your faith or philosophy.

Name: Subtle Theft
Benefits: Your thefts are harder to notice.

Name: Survey Wildlife
Benefits: Identify nearby creatures through signs and clues.

Name: Tame Animal
Benefits: Animals born and raised far from humanoid settlements rarely get along with two-legged beings, whom they assume to be dangerous predators.

Name: Terrain Expertise
Benefits: +1 to Survival checks in certain terrain.

Name: Terrain Stalker
Benefits: Sneak in certain terrain without attempting a check.

Name: Titan Wrestler
Benefits: Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip larger creatures.

Name: Train Animal
Benefits: Teach an animal a trick.

Name: Trick Magic Item
Prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
Benefits: Activate a magic item you normally can't activate.

Name: Underwater Marauder
Benefits: Fight more effectively underwater.

Name: Virtuosic Performer
Benefits: +1 with a certain type of performance.

Name: Armored Stealth
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Reduce the Stealth penalty of your armor.

Name: Assured Identification
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
Benefits: Avoid misidentifying magic.

Name: Aura Sight
Benefits: You've learned how to read the natural auras of other living creatures.

Name: Automatic Knowledge
Prerequisites: expert in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Assurance in that skill
Benefits: Recall Knowledge as a free action once per round.

Name: Automatic Writing
Benefits: When confronted with the unknown, you can receive knowledge beyond your own experience via written messages delivered by your hand.

Name: Backup Disguise
Benefits: You have a specific disguise that you keep at the ready, worn underneath your outer garment.

Name: Battle Planner
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Make a battle plan and roll Warfare Lore for initiative.

Name: Bonded Animal
Benefits: An animal becomes permanently helpful to you.

Name: Chromotherapy
Benefits: You firmly believe in the technique of strengthening one's life force, spiritual energies, and bodily fluids through the application of colored light.

Name: Confabulator
Benefits: Reduce the bonuses against your repeated lies.

Name: Connections
Benefits: Leverage your connections for favors and meetings.

Name: Continual Recovery
Benefits: Treat Wounds on a patient more often.

Name: Criminal Connections
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Leverage your underworld connections for favors from criminals.

Name: Discreet Inquiry
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Gather Information without revealing your motive.

Name: Distracting Performance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Create a Diversion for an ally.

Name: Embed Aeon Stone
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You discover the secrets to embedding aeon stones into your flesh.

Name: Encouraging Words
Benefits: You give an ally a quick pep talk, helping them recover.

Name: Exhort the Faithful
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: expert in Religion; follower of a specific religion
Benefits: +2 to Request something of or Coerce members of your own faith.

Name: Express Driver
Benefits: You can optimize your vehicle's performance, coaxing extra speed and choosing paths to avoid slowdowns.

Name: Eye of the Arclords
Benefits: The Arclords of Nex have achieved a unique mastery of magic.

Name: Familiar Oddities
Prerequisites: Curse Maelstrom Dedication; trained in Occultism or Curse Lore
Benefits: Perhaps due to the curse within you, curses occasionally perceive you as an extension of themselves and readily reveal themselves to you.

Name: Fresh Ingredients
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When using Natural Medicine to Treat Wounds, you can spend a batch of herbs to gain the +2 circumstance bonus from having fresh ingredients, even if not in wilderness.

Name: Glad-Hand
Benefits: Make an Impression on a target you've just met.

Name: Godless Healing
Prerequisites: Battle Medicine; can't have a patron deity
Benefits: With limited access to divine healing magic, Rahadoumi often become adept at using ordinary medicine for when dangerous situations arise.

Name: Intimidating Prowess
Benefits: Gain a bonus to physically Demoralize a target.

Name: Juggle
Source: Pathfinder #151
Benefits: You can Juggle items and still use your hands between tosses.

Name: Lasting Coercion
Benefits: Coerce a target into helping you longer.

Name: Lead Climber
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Make Climbing safer for allies who Follow the Expert.

Name: Magical Crafting
Benefits: Craft magic items.

Name: Magical Shorthand
Prerequisites: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
Benefits: Learn spells quickly and at a reduced cost.

Name: Malleable Movement
Prerequisites: Mind Smith Dedication; expert in Athletics
Benefits: You shift the shape of your weapon to help you Leap farther and faster.

Name: Mortal Healing
Prerequisites: Godless Healing, you follow the Laws of Mortality
Benefits: You grant greater healing when the gods don’t interfere

Name: Nimble Crawl
Benefits: Crawl at a faster rate.

Name: Powerful Leap
Benefits: Jump farther and higher.

Name: Quick Contacts
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: expert in Society; Connections, or Criminal Connections
Benefits: Spend only 1 day to use Connections or Criminal Connections.

Name: Quick Disguise
Benefits: Set up a disguise in only half the time.

Name: Quiet Allies
Benefits: Roll a single Stealth check when sneaking with allies.

Name: Rapid Mantel
Benefits: Pull yourself onto ledges quickly.

Name: Robust Recovery
Benefits: Greater benefits from Treat Disease and Treat Poison.

Name: Shadow Mark
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Targets you’re following take a penalty to notice you.

Name: Sow Rumor
Benefits: You spread rumors, which may or may not be true, about a specific subject.

Name: Spirit Speaker
Benefits: You know that when an animal dies, its spirit lingers briefly before moving on.

Name: Tattoo Artist
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You can craft tattoos, including magical tattoos.

Name: Terrifying Resistance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: +1 to spell saves from a creature you’ve Demoralized.

Name: Tweak Appearances
Benefits: You can alter a creature's clothing to improve their social impact.

Name: Underground Network
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Gather Information without drawing attention and gain a bonus to Recall Knowledge about that subject.

Name: Unmistakable Lore
Benefits: Recall Knowledge about your Lore more effectively.

Name: Ward Medic
Benefits: Treat several patients at once.

Name: Wary Disarmament
Benefits: +2 to AC or saves against devices or traps you trigger while disarming.

Name: Wilderness Spotter
Source: The Fall of Plaguestone
Benefits: Use Survival for your Initiative when in a specific terrain.

Name: Folk Dowsing
Benefits: You can find what you're looking for using a dowsing rod or pendulum.

Name: Know the Beat
Source: Pathfinder #149
Benefits: You have been trained to investigate crimes.

Name: Blessed Medicine
Source: Book of the Dead
Benefits: Your experience battling undead has uniquely prepared you to fight the diseases they inflict on the survivors, and you know that leaving these maladies untreated for long will eventually lead to more undead.

Name: Change of Face
Benefits: You know that for the best disguise to work, one requires not only the right skills but also the right look—luckily you can copy both using special magical techniques.

Name: Dead Reckoning
Prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; trained in Survival
Benefits: You've trained yourself to maintain a strong sense of direction at all times, even when you can't use a compass or see the sky above.

Name: Diabolic Certitude
Benefits: Your Hellknight training drilled details of Hell’s denizens deep into your mind.

Name: Distracting Flattery
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You know how to maintain a good impression and manage your image, even while keeping uncouth company.

Name: Eclipsed Vitality
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Prerequisites: Assassin Dedication, or Scout Dedication; master in Stealth
Benefits: You shroud yourself in ashes that hide the vital essence sought by life-sensing undead.

Name: Engine Bay
Prerequisites: Vehicle Mechanic Dedication; expert in Crafting
Benefits: You are practiced at working in vast garages of vehicles and can work on many machines at a time.

Name: Familiar Foe
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Prerequisites: Lastwall Sentry Dedication; expert in Religion or Undead Lore
Benefits: You regularly face off against undead and can identify many with a glance.

Name: Fancy Moves
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You show off your fighting style to discourage your foes.

Name: Fane's Escape
Benefits: A good getaway requires a good distraction.

Name: Final Rest
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Benefits: As stubborn in death as you are in life, you vow you'll never aid your hated enemies.

Name: Gear Gnash
Benefits: Snares you create have complicated inner workings that are quite difficult to disable.

Name: Hidden Magic
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion; Vigilante Dedication
Benefits: You've learned to hide the magical auras of your gear.

Name: Hideous Ululation
Benefits: Your throat has multiple separate chambers that can give your voice an eerie echo.

Name: In Plain Sight
Benefits: People often only see what they want to see, a weakness you know how to take full advantage of.

Name: Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover
Benefits: Kreighton teaches his students that an agile mind can glean clues leading to the truth, even from the most unlikely of sources.

Name: Minion Guise
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: animal companion, or familiar; expert in Deception; Vigilante Dedication
Benefits: When you are in your social identity, you can also grant a social identity to an animal companion, familiar, or other minion.

Name: Multilingual Cipher
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You use multiple languages to create and break codes.

Name: Named Artillery
Benefits: It is a tradition among artillerists to name the siege weapon most important to them and closest to their heart—much as a sailor on a ship, the weapon is their livelihood.

Name: Orthographic Mastery
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You understand the principles that underlie all written words, allowing you to read nearly any text.

Name: Phonetic Training
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can pronounce and repeat words with near-perfect accuracy even if you don't understand their meaning.

Name: Power Slide
Benefits: You throw the vehicle into a barely controlled skid, turning sharply to evade pursuit or bring your weapons to bear.

Name: Quick Mount
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You and your mount can spring into action at a moment's notice.

Name: Reverse Engineering
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You are able to reverse engineer items into formulas more effectively than most.

Name: Rope Runner
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground.

Name: Settlement Scholastics
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your studies open up new horizons.

Name: Sociable Vow
Benefits: You can leverage your vow in more social interactions.

Name: Steel Skin
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You wear your armor like a second skin.

Name: Sure Foot
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Horizon Walker Dedication; expert in Acrobatics and Athletics
Benefits: You know the secrets of moving in your favored terrain.

Name: Thorough Reports
Benefits: Recalling Knowledge adds creatures to your list, granting you bonuses to Recall in future encounters.

Name: Treat Condition
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You treat an adjacent creature in an attempt to reduce the clumsy, enfeebled, or sickened condition.

Name: Analyze Idiolect
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Linguist Dedication; expert in Deception and Society
Benefits: You break down a specific individual's idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits.

Name: Craft Facsimile
Prerequisites: expert in Crafting; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
Benefits: You're renowned for your ability to recover important items and sometimes that requires creating a stand-in.

Name: Emerald Boughs Accustomation
Prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Emerald Boughs affiliation; expert in Society
Benefits: You are comfortable and socially capable in almost any cultural context.

Name: Forced Entry
Benefits: You are trained to preserve the archaeological value of your location when entering.

Name: Holistic Care
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You provide emotional and spiritual care.

Name: Megafauna Veterinarian
Prerequisites: Mammoth Lord Dedication; expert in Nature
Benefits: By heeding the wise advice of elders in your following— and aided by your own experience—you've learned how to provide medical care to the megafauna of the Mammoth Lord followings.

Name: Resourceful Ritualist
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can cast difficult rituals that might otherwise be just beyond your skill.

Name: Uzunjati Storytelling
Prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Uzunjati affiliation; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
Benefits: You tell a quick story or begin telling a longer tale.

Name: Advanced First Aid
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Use First Aid to reduce frightened and sickened condition values.

Name: Aerobatics Mastery
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Improve your ability to Maneuver in Flight.

Name: Ashen Veil
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Prerequisites: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; expert in Religion and master in Stealth
Benefits: By smearing ash or tainted earth over your skin and armor, you shroud yourself from the dead.

Name: Battle Cry
Benefits: Demoralizes foes when you roll for initiative.

Name: Battle Prayer
Prerequisites: master in Religion; you follow a deity
Benefits: Calling out to your deity, you recite scripture to harm a foe

Name: Biographical Eye
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Intuit details about someone’s profession and residence.

Name: Bizarre Magic
Benefits: Your magic becomes more difficult to identify.

Name: Bless Tonic
Prerequisites: master in Crafting; deity who grants heal divine font
Benefits: You channel positive energy into restoratives that ward against harm

Name: Bless Toxin
Prerequisites: master in Crafting; deity who grants harm divine font
Benefits: You pour negative energy into toxins you create to further debilitate your targets

Name: Chronocognizance
Prerequisites: Time Mage Dedication; master in Perception
Benefits: The flows and ebbs of time are obvious to you, as are the tangles that form when it's distorted.

Name: Consult the Spirits
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Learn about your environment from resident spirits.

Name: Disturbing Knowledge
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Frighten foes with occult secrets.

Name: Doublespeak
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Pass a secret message to allies in your conversation.

Name: Efficient Controls
Prerequisites: Vehicle Mechanic Dedication; master in Crafting
Benefits: By reducing redundant systems and streamlining essential functions, you have made it easier for the vehicle to operate with fewer crew.

Name: Entourage
Benefits: You have a small group of admirers who tend to follow you around while you’re in civilized settlements.

Name: Environmental Grace
Prerequisites: master in Survival; deity who grants the cold, fire, nature, or travel domain
Benefits: You rapidly adapt to environments through a combination of skill, meditation, and divine grace

Name: Evangelize
Prerequisites: master in Diplomacy; you follow a deity or philosophy
Benefits: You point out a detail that incontrovertibly supports your faith, causing a listener’s mind to whirl

Name: Expert Disassembler
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can apply the same techniques you use to reverse engineer objects to disable them.

Name: Fabricated Connections
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can lie about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

Name: Foil Senses
Benefits: Take precautions against special senses.

Name: Graceful Leaper
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Mass and muscle are meaningless when you leap; only grace and balance matter.

Name: Impeccable Crafting
Benefits: Craft items more efficiently.

Name: Influence Nature
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Influence the behavior of certain animals in the area.

Name: Inventor
Benefits: Use Crafting to create item formulas.

Name: Kip Up
Benefits: Stand up for free without triggering reactions.

Name: Morphic Manipulation
Benefits: You've attuned your natural aura to that of plant life, coaxing it to grow faster than normal.

Name: Muscle Mimicry
Prerequisites: Alter Ego Dedication; master in Deception and trained in Athletics
Benefits: Your study of another allows you to mirror their movements subtly, even in the heat of combat.

Name: Paragon Battle Medicine
Benefits: Kassi Aziril taught you her techniques that originated the modern use of Battle Medicine.

Name: Party Crasher
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You attend all the fashionable society parties, no matter how exclusive they might be.

Name: Planar Survival
Benefits: Use Survival to Subsist on different planes.

Name: Prepare Papers
Source: Pathfinder #178
Prerequisites: Alkenstar Agent Dedication; master in Society
Benefits: You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority.

Name: Propeller Attachment
Benefits: You've mastered attaching clockwork propellers to your daily quick-deploy snares that use gears.

Name: Push it
Prerequisites: Trick Driver Dedication; master in Driving Lore
Benefits: You can push your vehicle's performance beyond the limits envisioned by its makers.

Name: Quick Climb
Benefits: Climb swiftly.

Name: Quick Recognition
Prerequisites: master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion; Recognize Spell
Benefits: Identify spells as a free action.

Name: Quick Swim
Benefits: Swim quickly.

Name: Quick Unlock
Benefits: Pick a Lock with 1 action.

Name: Rapid Affixture
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Afﬁx a Talisman in less time.

Name: Read Shibboleths
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: All communication is filled with slight tells and signals.

Name: Sacred Defense
Prerequisites: master in Religion; you follow a deity
Benefits: You call upon your deity to grant you their protective blessing

Name: Sanctify Water
Prerequisites: good or evil deity; master in Religion
Benefits: You imbue water with your deity’s blessing

Name: Scholastic Identification
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

Name: Shameless Request
Benefits: Make Requests of others with lesser consequences.

Name: Skeptic's Defense
Benefits: You don't believe in any mental twaddle, and you're certainly not afraid of it.

Name: Slippery Secrets
Benefits: Evade attempts to uncover your true nature.

Name: Speech of the Mammoth Lords
Prerequisites: Mammoth Lord Dedication; master in Diplomacy and Intimidation
Benefits: You've learned the ancient tongue spoken by the creatures of the far north.

Name: Subjective Truth
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your disparate identities allow you to defeat magic that detects lies.

Name: Swift Sneak
Benefits: Move your full Speed while you Sneak.

Name: Terrified Retreat
Benefits: Cause foes you Demoralize to flee.

Name: That was a Close One, Huh?
Prerequisites: Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication; master in Deception
Benefits: You laugh innocently about the inexplicable luck of your last shot hitting its mark or how close the attack that just missed you came to taking your head off, causing your foes to second guess whether it's a good idea to oppose you in battle.

Name: Voice Cold as Death
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Benefits: Channeling the energy of the Crimson Oath into your voice, you pronounce a threat in a tone so icy it freezes the blood.

Name: Wall Jump
Benefits: Jump off walls.

Name: Water Sprint
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Stride across the surface of a body of water.

Name: Diverse Recognition
Prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; master in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
Benefits: Your Pathfinder training allows you to quickly size up numerous threats.

Name: Improvised Crafting
Benefits: You've learned to repair your equipment even in challenging circumstances, making use of what you have available.

Name: Insistent Command
Source: Pathfinder #152
Prerequisites: master in Nature; Animal Trainer Dedication
Benefits: When you roll a success to Command an Animal, you get a critical success.

Name: Recognize Threat
Prerequisites: master in a Recall Knowledge skill; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
Benefits: You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team.

Name: Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent)
Prerequisites: master in Medicine; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
Benefits: Pathfinders are trained to help each other be safe and successful, and you know how to jolt your allies back to their senses.

Name: Unravel Mysteries
Prerequisites: master in a Decipher Writing skill; Scrollmaster Dedication
Benefits: You can understand the true meaning of texts quickly, and even when you get lost or hit a dead end, you aren’t discouraged from making further attempts to get to the bottom of things.

Name: Emissary of Peace
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Benefits: Even when bloodshed is inevitable, you would rather see your foes surrender.

Name: Masterful Obfuscation
Prerequisites: master in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Scrollmaster Dedication
Benefits: You've mastered the art of deceiving others about your area of study.

Name: Uzunjati Recollection
Prerequisites: Uzunjati Storytelling; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
Benefits: You tell a story spontaneously from nearly forgotten facts, delving into your memory and entertaining your audience in the process.

Name: Emergency Medical Assistance
Benefits: You've learned a variety of methods for helping allies who are bleeding, burning, or otherwise suffering persistent damage, from brushing off acid to patting down fires.

Name: Recollect Studies
Prerequisites: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
Benefits: You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures.

Name: Rugged Survivalist
Benefits: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness.

Name: Cloud Jump
Benefits: Jump impossible distances.

Name: Craft Anything
Benefits: Ignore most requirements for crafting items.

Name: Divine Guidance
Benefits: Find guidance in the writings of your faith.

Name: Legendary Codebreaker
Benefits: Quickly Decipher Writing using Society.

Name: Legendary Guide
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Increase your party’s travel speed through wilderness terrain

Name: Legendary Linguist
Benefits: Create pidgin languages to communicate with anyone.

Name: Legendary Medic
Benefits: Remove disease or the blinded, deafened, doomed, or drained condition.

Name: Legendary Negotiation
Benefits: Quickly parley with foes.

Name: Legendary Performer
Benefits: Gain renown for your Performance Virtuosic Performer.

Name: Legendary Professional
Benefits: Gain renown for your Lore.

Name: Legendary Sneak
Benefits: Hide and Sneak without cover or being concealed.

Name: Legendary Survivalist
Benefits: Survive extreme conditions.

Name: Legendary Thief
Benefits: Steal what would normally be impossible to steal.

Name: Reveal Machinations
Benefits: You convince a creature that you played a minor but recurring role in its life.

Name: Scare to Death
Benefits: Scare a target so much, they might die.

Name: Unified Theory
Benefits: Use Arcana for checks for all magical traditions.
